Description: The name of the arm or factor (can include a specific intervention, a placebo or even a lack of intervention, ie- 'no intervention' group)
The role of the arm or factor in the study this is equivalent to the ArmType in ClinicalTrials.gov
allowed values: ["experimental arm", "active comparator arm", "placebo comparator arm", "sham comparator arm", "no intervention arm"]

Description: A description of the arm or factor
The interventions (if any) in this ArmGroup
The category of the arm or factor in the study
The name of the intervention in the study
A description of the intervention in the study
